thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development sees FY 2017 net profit up 53.25 pct to 83.25 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development sees FY 2017 net profit up 53.25 pct to 83.25 pct

organizations.name: shenzhen friendcom technology development co ltd

text:
Jan 22(Reuters) - Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 53.25 percent to 83.25 percent, or to be 67 million yuan to 80.1 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 43.7 million yuan
* The reasons for the forecast are increased power information collection income and decreased financial expense Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/rpu5nQ Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
